title: Aarya Emerald & Diamond Gold Bangles - Vanki Design
materials: Polki Diamonds. Featuring a rich Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately designed Vanki style bangles, featuring floral motifs and swirling patterns. The oval-cut emeralds are bezel-set, beautifully complementing the Polki diamond accents. Antique finish enhances the traditional appeal.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds and the subtle shimmer of Polki diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for traditional occasions like weddings
and other auspicious events. Also a stunning addition to elevate your special occasion attire.
description: These exquisitely crafted bangles embody the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry design. The combination of emeralds and Polki diamonds exudes elegance and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty. A timeless investment and a treasured heirloom.
